verses.verse: אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then יִקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <S%H3091><s%> Then Joshua לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <S%H7206><s%> the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <S%H1425><s%> and the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and the half מַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You שְׁמַרְתֶּ֔ם <S%H8104><s%> unto them Ye have kept אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> all that Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתִּשְׁמְע֣וּ <S%H8085><s%> you and have obeyed בְקוֹלִ֔י <S%H6963><s%> my voice לְכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> i צִוִּ֖יתִי <S%H6680><s%> in all that I commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not עֲזַבְתֶּ֣ם <S%H5800><s%> Ye have not left אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H251><s%> your brethren זֶ֚ה <S%H2088><s%> these יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> these many עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֕ם <S%H8104><s%> but have kept אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁמֶ֕רֶת <S%H4931><s%> the charge מִצְוַ֖ת <S%H4687><s%> of the commandment יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> and now הֵנִ֨יחַ <S%H5117><s%> hath given rest יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> And now the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶם֙ <S%H430><s%> your God לַֽאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> unto your brethren כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> as he promised לָהֶ֑ם וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> now פְּנוּ֩ <S%H6437><s%> them therefore now return וּלְכ֨וּ <S%H1980><s%> and go לָכֶ֜ם לְאָהֳלֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> you unto your tents אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> [and] unto the land אֲחֻזַּתְכֶ֔ם <S%H272><s%> of your possession אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָכֶ֗ם מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> you on the other side הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan

רַ֣ק ׀ <S%H7535><s%> but שִׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> heed מְאֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> But take diligent לַעֲשׂ֨וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <S%H4687><s%> the commandment וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָה֮ <S%H8451><s%> and the law אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> charged אֶתְכֶם֮ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לְ֠אַהֲבָה <S%H157><s%> you to love אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H430><s%> your God וְלָלֶ֧כֶת <S%H1980><s%> and walk בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דְּרָכָ֛יו <S%H1870><s%> in all his ways וְלִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> and to keep מִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וּלְדָבְקָה־ <S%H1692><s%> and to cleave ב֑וֹ וּלְעָבְד֕וֹ <S%H5647><s%> unto him and to serve בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> him with all your heart וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ <S%H5315><s%> and with all your soul

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖ם <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> So Joshua וַֽיְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <S%H7971><s%> them and sent them away וַיֵּלְכ֖וּ <S%H1980><s%> went אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָהֳלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H168><s%> unto their tents ס

וְלַחֲצִ֣י ׀ <S%H2677><s%> Now to the [one] half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> of the tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> had given מֹשֶׁה֮ <S%H4872><s%> Moses בַּבָּשָׁן֒ <S%H1316><s%> [possession] in Bashan וּלְחֶצְי֗וֹ <S%H2677><s%> but unto the [other] half נָתַ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> thereof gave יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> among אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren [מֵעֵבֶר כ] (בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> beyond ק) הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan יָ֑מָּה <S%H3220><s%> westward וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> So כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> when שִׁלְּחָ֧ם <S%H7971><s%> sent them away יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <S%H3091><s%> And when Joshua אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָהֳלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H168><s%> also unto their tents וַיְבָרֲכֵֽם׃ <S%H1288><s%> then he blessed

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he spake אֲלֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H413><s%> and to לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto them saying בִּנְכָסִ֨ים <S%H5233><s%> riches רַבִּ֜ים <S%H7227><s%> with much שׁ֤וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> Return אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אָֽהֳלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H168><s%> unto your tents וּבְמִקְנֶ֣ה <S%H4735><s%> cattle רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> much מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> and with very בְּכֶ֨סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver וּבְזָהָ֜ב <S%H2091><s%> and with gold וּבִנְחֹ֧שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> and with brass וּבְבַרְזֶ֛ל <S%H1270><s%> and with iron וּבִשְׂלָמ֖וֹת <S%H8008><s%> raiment הַרְבֵּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> and with very חִלְק֥וּ <S%H2505><s%> divide שְׁלַל־ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil אֹיְבֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H341><s%> of your enemies עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H251><s%> with your brethren פ

וַיָּשֻׁ֣בוּ <S%H7725><s%> returned וַיֵּלְכ֡וּ <S%H1980><s%> and departed בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֜ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וַחֲצִ֣י ׀ <S%H2677><s%> and the half שֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh מֵאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> from the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִשִּׁלֹ֖ה <S%H7887><s%> out of Shiloh אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> which [is] in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan לָלֶ֜כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the country הַגִּלְעָ֗ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land אֲחֻזָּתָם֙ <S%H272><s%> of their possession אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נֹֽאחֲזוּ־ <S%H270><s%> whereof they were possessed בָ֔הּ עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> according פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> And when they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to גְּלִיל֣וֹת <S%H1552><s%> unto the borders הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> that [are] in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan וַיִּבְנ֣וּ <S%H1129><s%> built בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children רְאוּבֵ֣ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֡ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and the half שֵׁבֶט֩ <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֨ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> there an altar עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> by Jordan מִזְבֵּ֥חַ <S%H4196><s%> altar גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> a great לְמַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> to see to

וַיִּשְׁמְע֥וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> say הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בָנ֣וּ <S%H1129><s%> have built בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Behold the children רְאוּבֵ֣ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֡ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וַחֲצִי֩ <S%H2677><s%> and the half שֵׁ֨בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּׁ֜ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at מוּל֙ <S%H4136><s%> over against אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> in גְּלִילוֹת֙ <S%H1552><s%> in the borders הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <S%H3383><s%> of Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on עֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> at the passage בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <S%H8085><s%> heard בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And when the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּקָּ֨הֲל֜וּ <S%H6950><s%> gathered themselves together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> [of it] the whole congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel שִׁלֹ֔ה <S%H7887><s%> at Shiloh לַעֲל֥וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> against לַצָּבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> to war פ

וַיִּשְׁלְח֨וּ <S%H7971><s%> sent בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children רְאוּבֵ֧ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and to the children גָ֛ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and to the half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <S%H7626><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּינְחָ֖ס <S%H6372><s%> Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> the priest

וַעֲשָׂרָ֤ה <S%H6235><s%> And with him ten נְשִׂאִים֙ <S%H5387><s%> princes עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with נָשִׂ֨יא <S%H5387><s%> chief אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> one נָשִׂ֤יא <S%H5387><s%> chiefs אֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> one לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house אָ֔ב <S%H1><s%> a prince לְכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> each מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and each one רֹ֧אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> [was] an head בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> among לְאַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> among the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיָּבֹ֜אוּ <S%H935><s%> And they came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children רְאוּבֵ֧ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and to the children גָ֛ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to חֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and to the half שֵֽׁבֶט־ <S%H7626><s%> tribe מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land הַגִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead וַיְדַבְּר֥וּ <S%H1696><s%> and they spake אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> with them saying

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמְר֞וּ <S%H559><s%> Thus saith כֹּ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> the whole עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> the whole congregation יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָֽה־ <S%H4100><s%> What הַמַּ֤עַל <S%H4603><s%> [is] this that ye have committed הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> is this אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which מְעַלְתֶּם֙ <S%H4603><s%> have committed בֵּאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> against the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> to turn away הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day מֵאַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> from following יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בִּבְנֽוֹתְכֶ֤ם <S%H1129><s%> in that ye have builded לָכֶם֙ מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> you an altar לִמְרָדְכֶ֥ם <S%H4775><s%> that ye might rebel הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

הַמְעַט־ <S%H4592><s%> too little לָ֙נוּ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲוֹ֣ן <S%H5771><s%> [Is] the iniquity פְּע֔וֹר <S%H6465><s%> of Peor אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not הִטַּהַ֙רְנוּ֙ <S%H2891><s%> for us from which we are not cleansed מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> at עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> came הַנֶּ֖גֶף <S%H5063><s%> although there was a plague בַּעֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> in the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

חָלִילָה֩ <S%H2486><s%> God forbid לָּ֨נוּ מִמֶּ֜נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> should לִמְרֹ֣ד <S%H4775><s%> that we should rebel בַּֽיהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD וְלָשׁ֤וּב <S%H7725><s%> and turn הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> from following יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD לִבְנ֣וֹת <S%H1129><s%> to build מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for burnt offerings לְמִנְחָ֣ה <S%H4503><s%> for meat offerings וּלְזָ֑בַח <S%H2077><s%> or for sacrifices מִלְּבַ֗ד <S%H905><s%> alone מִזְבַּח֙ <S%H4196><s%> beside the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> that [is] before מִשְׁכָּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H4908><s%> his tabernacle פ

וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <S%H8085><s%> which [were] with him heard פִּֽינְחָ֣ס <S%H6372><s%> And when Phinehas הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וּנְשִׂיאֵ֨י <S%H5387><s%> and the princes הָעֵדָ֜ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation וְרָאשֵׁ֨י <S%H7218><s%> and heads אַלְפֵ֤י <S%H505><s%> of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֔וֹ <S%H854><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַ֨דְּבָרִ֔ים <S%H1697><s%> the words אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבְּר֛וּ <S%H1696><s%> spake בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> that the children רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children מְנַשֶּׁ֑ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh וַיִּיטַ֖ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted בְּעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> affliction

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said פִּֽינְחָ֣ס <S%H6372><s%> And Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֡ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> unto the children רְאוּבֵ֨ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and to the children גָ֜ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and to the children מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh הַיּ֤וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> This day יָדַ֙עְנוּ֙ <S%H3045><s%> we perceive כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> is in בְתוֹכֵ֣נוּ <S%H8432><s%> [is] among יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> because לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not מְעַלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H4603><s%> us because ye have not committed בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD הַמַּ֣עַל <S%H4604><s%> this trespass הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אָ֗ז <S%H227><s%> now הִצַּלְתֶּ֛ם <S%H5337><s%> ye have delivered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מִיַּ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> out of the hand יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

וַיָּ֣שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> returned פִּֽינְחָ֣ס <S%H6372><s%> And Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֣ן ׀ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְהַנְּשִׂיאִ֡ים <S%H5387><s%> and the princes מֵאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> from the children רְאוּבֵן֩ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּמֵאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and from the children גָ֜ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad מֵאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land הַגִּלְעָ֛ד <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land כְּנַ֖עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> to the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיָּשִׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> them word

וַיִּיטַ֣ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted הַדָּבָ֗ר <S%H1697><s%> And the thing בְּעֵינֵי֙ <S%H5869><s%> affliction בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיְבָרֲכ֥וּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed אֱלֹהִ֖ים <S%H430><s%> God בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not אָמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> and did not intend לַעֲל֤וֹת <S%H5927><s%> to go up עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5921><s%> against לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> against them in battle לְשַׁחֵת֙ <S%H7843><s%> to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> wherein the children רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the sons גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> and Gad יֹשְׁבִ֥ים <S%H3427><s%> dwelt בָּֽהּ׃

וַֽיִּקְרְא֛וּ <S%H7121><s%> called בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children רְאוּבֵ֥ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> and the children גָ֖ד <S%H1410><s%> of Gad לַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <S%H4196><s%> the altar כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> is a עֵ֥ד <S%H5707><s%> [Ed] for it [shall be] a witness הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he בֵּֽינֹתֵ֔ינוּ <S%H996><s%> between כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> between us that the LORD הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [is] God פ
